00061 /*
00062  * class TREX::transaction::Player::op_request
00063  */ 
00064 Player::op_request::op_request(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &node)
00065   :m_id(parse_attr<std::string>(node, "id")) {
00066   boost::property_tree::ptree::assoc_iterator i = node.second.find("Goal");
00067   if( node.second.not_found()==i ) 
00068     throw XmlError(node, "Unable to find Goal description");
00069   m_request.reset(new Goal(*i));  
00070 }

00107 void Player::clear(std::list<Player::transaction *> &l) {
00108   for(std::list<Player::transaction *>::iterator i=l.begin();
00109       l.end()!=i; ++i) 
00110     delete *i;
00111   l.clear();
00112 }
00113 
00114 TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type &Player::transform(TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type &arg) {
00115   set_attr(TeleoReactor::xml_factory::node(arg), "log", 0);
00116   return arg;
00117 }

00120 // structors
00121 
00122 Player::Player(TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type arg) 
00123   :TeleoReactor(transform(arg), false), m_continue(true) {
00124   std::string
00125     file_name = parse_attr<std::string>(getName().str()+".tr.log",
00126                                    TeleoReactor::xml_factory::node(arg),
00127                                    "file");
00128   bool found;
00129 
00130   file_name = manager().use(file_name, found);
00131   if( !found ) {
00132     syslog("ERROR")<<"Unable to locate transaction log \""<<file_name<<"\".";
00133     throw ReactorException(*this, "Unable to locate specified transaction log file.");
00134   }
00135   boost::property_tree::ptree pt;
00136   
00137   read_xml(file_name, pt, xml::no_comments|xml::trim_whitespace);
00138 
00139   if( pt.empty() ) {
00140     syslog("ERROR")<<"Transaction log \""<<file_name<<"\" is empty.";
00141     throw ReactorException(*this, "Empty transaction file.");    
00142   }
00143   if( pt.size()!=1 ) {
00144     syslog("ERROR")<<"Transaction log \""<<file_name<<"\" has more than 1 root.";
00145     throw ReactorException(*this, "Invalid transaction file.");    
00146   }
00147   loadTransactions(pt.front().second);
00148 }
00149 
00150 Player::~Player() {
00151   for( std::map<TICK, std::list<transaction *> >::iterator i=m_exec.begin();
00152        m_exec.end()!=i; ++i )
00153     clear(i->second);
00154   m_exec.clear();
00155 }

00159 
00160 void Player::loadTransactions(boost::property_tree::ptree &properties) {
00161   boost::property_tree::ptree::assoc_iterator i, last;
00162 
00163   boost::tie(i, last) = properties.equal_range("header");
00164   if( last==i )
00165     syslog("WARN")<<"Transaction log file does not have an header.";
00166   else {
00167     Symbol tl;
00168     for(;last!=i; ++i) {
00169       for(boost::property_tree::ptree::iterator j=i->second.begin(); 
00170          i->second.end()!=j; ++j) {
00171        if( is_tag(*j, "provide") ) {
00172          op_provide(*j).accept(*this);
00173        }  else if( is_tag(*j, "use") ) {
00174          op_use(*j).accept(*this);
00175        } else if( is_tag(*j, "unprovide") ) {
00176          op_unprovide(*j).accept(*this);
00177        }  else if( is_tag(*j, "unuse") ) {
00178          op_unuse(*j).accept(*this);
00179        } else if( !is_tag(*j, "<xmlattr>") ) //< <xmlattr> can be silently ignored 
00180          syslog("WARN")<<"Unexpected tag \""<<j->first<<"\" in transaction header.";
00181       }
00182     }
00183   }
00184   size_t tr_count = 0;
00185   boost::tie(i, last) = properties.equal_range("tick");
00186   for( ; last!=i; ++i) {
00187     TICK cur = parse_attr<TICK>(*i, "value");
00188     std::list<transaction *> &ops = m_exec[cur];    
00189     for(boost::property_tree::ptree::iterator it=i->second.begin();
00190        i->second.end()!=it; ++it) {
00191       if( is_tag(*it, "provide") ) {
00192        ops.push_back(new op_provide(*it));
00193       }  else if( is_tag(*it, "use") ) {
00194        ops.push_back(new op_use(*it));
00195       } else if( is_tag(*it, "unprovide") ) {
00196        ops.push_back(new op_unprovide(*it));
00197       }  else if( is_tag(*it, "unuse") ) {
00198        ops.push_back(new op_unuse(*it));
00199       } else if( is_tag(*it, "Observation") ) {
00200        ops.push_back(new op_assert(*it));
00201       } else if( is_tag(*it, "request") ) {
00202        ops.push_back(new op_request(*it));
00203       } else if ( is_tag(*it, "recall") ) {
00204        ops.push_back(new op_recall(*it));
00205       } else if( is_tag(*it, "token") ) {
00206        ops.push_back(new op_token(*it));
00207       } else if ( is_tag(*it, "cancel") ) {
00208        ops.push_back(new op_cancel(*it));
00209       } else if( !is_tag(*it, "<xmlattr>") ) //< <xmlattr> can be silently ignored 
00210        syslog("WARN")<<"Ignoring tag \""<<it->first<<'\"';     
00211     }
00212     tr_count += ops.size();
00213     // if( !ops.empty() )
00214     //   syslog()<<"Loaded "<<ops.size()<<" operations for tick "<<cur;
00215   }
00216   if( m_exec.empty() ) 
00217     syslog("WARN")<<"The log from the reactor did not do anything !";
00218   else 
00219     syslog()<<tr_count<<" transactions extracted from the log";
00220 }
00221 
00222 void Player::play_request(std::string const &id, goal_id const &g) {  
00223   if( !postGoal(g) )
00224     syslog("WARN")<<"Failed to post goal "<<g;
00225   else
00226     m_goals[id] = g;
00227 }
00228 
00229 void Player::play_recall(std::string const &id) {
00230   std::map<std::string, goal_id>::iterator i = m_goals.find(id);
00231   if( m_goals.end()==i )
00232     syslog("WARN")<<"goal \""<<id<<"\" not found in my lookup table.";
00233   else {
00234     syslog("recall")<<"RECALL "<<i->second<<" (Log ID: "<<i->first<<").";    
00235     postRecall(i->second);
00236     m_goals.erase(i);
00237   }
00238 }
00239 
00240 void Player::play_token(std::string const &id, goal_id const &g) {
00241   if( !postPlanToken(g) )
00242     syslog("WARN")<<"Failed to post plan token "<<g;
00243   else
00244     m_goals[id] = g;  
00245 }
00246 
00247 void Player::play_cancel(std::string const &id) {
00248   std::map<std::string, goal_id>::iterator i = m_goals.find(id);
00249   if( m_goals.end()==i )
00250     syslog("WARN")<<"token \""<<id<<"\" not found in lookup table.";
00251   else {
00252     cancelPlanToken(i->second);
00253     m_goals.erase(i);
00254   }
00255 }

00257 
00258 // calbacks
00259 
00260 void Player::handleTickStart() {
00261   TICK cur = getCurrentTick();
00262   std::map<TICK, std::list<transaction *> >::iterator i = m_exec.find(cur);
00263   if( m_exec.end()!=i ) {
00264     while( !i->second.empty() ) {
00265       transaction *tmp = i->second.front();
00266       i->second.pop_front();
00267       tmp->accept(*this);
00268       delete tmp;
00269     }
00270     m_exec.erase(i);
00271   }
00272 }
00273 
00274 bool Player::synchronize() {
00275   return m_continue;
00276 }
